I wanted to stay home to ... But the Selective Service drew my # & the Draft / drafted me! I should have said NO ... I'm gay ... I don't want to go Now that won't even work. Which is sad because You can be drafted as a gay person now ... No exemption BUT in 1/2 the States You can be fired from your job or evicted for being gay, but you still have to join the military if drafted! NOT FAIR! I'd tell any Gay person, if drafted, to NOT go until full Equality & Protection is gained in all50 States! Period! Don't fight to protect Rights YOU don't enjoy like everyone else!

HERO U.S. Marine Sergeant Chris Marquez was robbed and beaten Friday in D.C. at a McDonalds by several black teens. The teens, who were sought by D.C. police earlier that day, approached and antagonized Marquez about the Black Lives Matter movement. When Marquez refused to engage, he was beaten and robbed outside the restaurant. Marquez has been recognized for his accomplishments, including bronze statues of him throughout the U.S. Marine bases. Help spread the word and donate on his GoFundMe page!
